channel.title: Postgres Open on The Art of PostgreSQL
channel.description: Recent content in Postgres Open on The Art of PostgreSQL

item.title: The Art of PostgreSQL: The Transcript, part III
item.description: This article is a transcript of the conference I gave at Postgres Open 2019, titled the same as the book: The Art of PostgreSQL. It’s availble as a video online at Youtube if you want to watch the slides and listen to it, and it even has a subtext!
